website_summaries.verdict: This toy drone is fun to look at, but is limited on battery life and control.
pros: The protective shield is soft and bendable, so it's safe for kids to play with
Does a decent job of sensing its surroundings to prevent crashes
cons: Overall, it's not very easy to control with your hands and could get away if you're not careful

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe
customer_reviews.text: These drones are supposed to be safe for children to use but this particular brand has a large circular hole on top so when you reach out to get it your fingers can easily go thru the top and hit the blades. Also the remote did not work. We cut a finger on this thing. Most other brands are totally enclosed in a cage like design - we sent this one back and got one of those instead. Save yourself the hassle and order the better designed ones the first time.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: very fu n
customer_reviews.text: Oh, my God, this toy makes me too surprised, can be manually sensed, responsive, very fun
customer_reviews.author: erer

customer_reviews.title: So fun to play with
customer_reviews.text: This flying ball is so much fun. The neat thing is that it hovers at a certain height and goes up and down within that range so it doesn’t ever fly away out of reach. The cage keeps it protected and there are detectors to avoid side collision so it flies in the open space in your room. The only thing is don’t throw it up too close to the ceiling as the motion of the air will trap it against the ceiling as it ascends. However just push the one button remote and it’ll slowly descend and land on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Kiyo

customer_reviews.title: This were a real Hit.
customer_reviews.text: OK, I bought 2 of these for my twin nephews. they are 12, a very hard age to buy for. I made sure to charge them before hand. Well everyone loved them, even the adults. I thought they would be fragile, but they have held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Admin.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This toy is so much fun! It’s super light weight and it’s a soft bendable plastic so you don’t have to worry about it breaking. This little toy gets my kids off the couch and moving and that’s what I love most about it!
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Cheap garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely garbage. I bought three, One for each of my grandchildren for Christmas and they LOVED them. We even ordered the wrong one from another company and sent it back to get another one of these. It’s too bad that effort and excitement ended in extreme disappointment for all. They’re so cheaply made that they broke almost instantly. They don’t hold a charge whatsoever and propellers and pieces of plastic in different spots broke in all three! These weren’t a cheap buy but they were very cheaply made. What a complete waste.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Stutzman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: In this way, the aircraft is thrown up, so that it can be lifted and lowered under your control, the remote control is also light enough, and the child can play at home.
customer_reviews.author: william tan

customer_reviews.title: Garbage and dangerous for kids ,,
customer_reviews.text: Unit suddenly started while being charged. Son tried to see if the switch was accidentally left on by manufacturer, and got cut because the gap between the guards is bigger than finger.. Then the unit didn't fly at all at the end.
customer_reviews.author: Pupps

customer_reviews.title: Crappy product
customer_reviews.text: Not as expected from viewing the video. There's no control and the battery life sucks as well and wouldn't recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: TCannon

customer_reviews.title: It is an ok product
customer_reviews.text: The Saucer we received does not fly like the one in the video but I guess is ok. Anyways, I do not have time to get another one in time for Christmas and this is in my kid's list to Santa. I guess we will make the best of it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy G

customer_reviews.title: Plug in is to small
customer_reviews.text: I Like This but the plug in for charging needs to be easier to plug in, many attempts to get it plugged in. Otherwise it's Fun.
customer_reviews.author: Acky

customer_reviews.title: Fun little toy!
customer_reviews.text: No remote control, sensor driven. My kids love it! The battery is a little too short.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play with
customer_reviews.text: It is durable, light and fun for everyone, even our four year old has fun with it under supervision. It is a good first step to handling a bigger drone. The battery life is limited though.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: This toy was cool for the first few minutes. Fun for my 6 year old as well as the adults in the house. Then suddenly, it wouldn't leave the ground. Several of us got nipped by the fans while trying to help it. We tried charging it but no change. We could tell that the fans weren't all working, then noticed that part of the plastic housing was already broken. What a disappointment for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Some loves it but outside it can get away. Ended up in the middle of a lake!
customer_reviews.author: Golf Dude

customer_reviews.title: Not the Flying Ball
customer_reviews.text: This is not the flying ball drone, but a cheaper knockoff. It worked, but not in the same way and looses power quickly.
customer_reviews.author: lhoop

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for our nephew for Christmas...
customer_reviews.text: Our nephew loved it, and I got one for myself. It responds to your hand motions and is safe for indoors. If you use it outdoors, it might just fly away!
customer_reviews.author: Craig E. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: good toy for the children.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toy for my kid’s Christmas gift. And I realized it is very light in weight. My child was surprised that is so easy to control and so much fun to play with it. I will say it is a good toy for the children.
customer_reviews.author: shirley

customer_reviews.title: Gift for 10 year old
customer_reviews.text: Item is a gift. I did try it. It seems to fly well.
customer_reviews.author: art for a cause llc

customer_reviews.title: Fun for Chrisstmas
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three for Christmas gifts for one grandson and two great grandsons. The grandson reported that they played with them all afternoon. So they must have been successful gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara G.

customer_reviews.title: Too hard!
customer_reviews.text: It was too hard compared to others we have. We couldn’t give it as a gift as planned due to to fear of hurting the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Lk

customer_reviews.title: Should be more durable!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last more than 45 days. Wasn't worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Giant piece of garbage. Could not be more cheaply made. I bet it cost them $0.11 to make. Didn’t even work once straight out of the box. Don’t waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: Keely Knight

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS!  Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely dangerous, the drone drops unexpectedly, there is no upward vertical sensor so it can fly right up into your face. It will entangle long hair. Very easy for fingers to go through protective screen and get hit by propellors.
customer_reviews.author: Magye

customer_reviews.title: 2 stars
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is short lived remote useless durability very fragile very hard to control with gesture motions
customer_reviews.author: Mums

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: This toy did not function properly out of the box. my grandbaby was totally disappointed. I purchased three of these items as a Christmas gift and opened one to get familiar with operating systems however it didn't work
customer_reviews.author: Willie C.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, keeps kids engaged
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it. Very easy to use. Remote switched it on and then my kids just follow it around, give a little push and it keep flying. Keeps the kids engaged.
customer_reviews.author: RAFI

customer_reviews.title: junk - do not buy
customer_reviews.text: does not work as advertised - battery takes forever to charge, and last 3 minutes - waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Product does not work correctly !!!
customer_reviews.text: Product does not work correctly. A disappointment for my son, unfortunately I just found it coming in Brazil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flys as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, except for remote control. 80% of the time the remote did not function. Very short battery life between charges. It does fly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: denis gitschier

customer_reviews.title: Too delicate
customer_reviews.text: Very delicate... it worked for 2 weeks n the charger point broke..!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing how they fly!
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids had lots of fun with hitting it back and forth. They were amazed at how they flew!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Majoria

customer_reviews.title: Good toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought a similar toy before, but the fan is outside, it is not safe, this is good, safe, fun, adults and children all love it.
customer_reviews.author: mercy

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after first day.
customer_reviews.text: Uncontrollable after first day. Spends a lot of time on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J.

customer_reviews.title: Not as fun as I first thought.
customer_reviews.text: Very limited amount of play time compared to how long it takes to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Cloud-Domsher

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun !
customer_reviews.text: Bought for grandson & he loved it ! He chased the dogs with it . Much laughter !
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Handles well
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t hold a charge as long as as i would like but does handle real well son has a blast with it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Big big hit at our family gathering Gave one to each little child present ... hope to leave an impression and memory stamp so they remember their auntie
customer_reviews.author: Mama. Bea

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Strong power when I just charge half hour that can play longer. My kids were so excited . It can play at your house,you don't have to go out.
customer_reviews.author: April
